title: I purchased Google pixel 4a in India and I am facing issue on the network,
content: I have purchased new Google pixel 4a through flipkart and I am facing network issue, all lf sudden the network hangs and no calls can be made or no incoming calls you need to keep checking the phone and restart and once its restarted the phone calls can be made, there is no service center were I can walking in Bangalore , did not expect this kindly of phones from Google should have sticked to Apple products who has better products
